mainHero.title: Product Snapshot:
mainHero.subtitle: A Data Analytics Tool for Material Engineers
mainHero.members: Team: Austin Martin and Daniel Helm
mainHero.description: Product Snapshot is a software tool that enhances material engineering at Qorvo by enabling efficient production part lookup, real-time data integration, and detailed analysis of production trends and performance metrics.

items.title: Part Lookup by Code and Date:
items.description: Quickly find parts using specific codes and date ranges.

items.title: Modification of Testing Limits:
items.description: Adjust test limits to meet changing requirements and standards.

items.title: Analysis of Material Performance:
items.description: Examine production trends and pass/failure rates to enhance quality control.

items.name: React.js
items.description: Used to create an intuitive and visually appealing user interface.

items.name: MirageJS
items.description: Used to simulate backend functionalities. The backend is where data processing and management occur, essential for supporting the user interface. This allowed for pre-testing of features before full integration.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
